text: @SkyeCity_ Yes!! This is not politically biased. Labour would have failed even more miserably.They ignored my JANUARY tweets to them to PREVENT forthwith any large gatherings. My motto: PREVENTION IS PREFERABLE to the cure. #Cheltenham 🤬 #COVID19 @BorisJohnson @DominicRaab 🤓👎🏿
